title: Crime and Drama Music Pack Volume 1
description: This is a music pack featuring eighteen unique dramatic instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral and ambient effects, all of these pieces are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present Crime and Drama Music Pack Volume 1! This is an asset pack that contains eighteen ambient instrumentals geared towards the world of crime, drama, horror, and other intense genres. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, tension-builds, and transitions for your projects.


Below are the track listings with key signature and length of time:

Artic Stronghold E Minor 1:54

Be On The Lookout D Minor 1:00

Enigma E Minor 1:20

It's Your Case Now G Minor 1:12

Mission Directives D Minor 1:20

The Chase Ends Here C Minor 1:40

The Investigation A Minor 1:42

The Last Download G Minor 1:18

The Longest Highway D Minor 2:10

The Main Terminal C Minor 1:14

The Ravage G Minor 1:26

The Server Room C Minor 1:20

The Shadows On The Wall B Minor 1:24

The Troubled Pursuit A Minor 1:22

Unknown Forest G Minor 2:25

Unsolved Mystery G Minor 1:29

Warehouse Search C Minor 1:38

We Gotta Find Them D Minor 1:10
